text: (ovun kæmati prakāra) yamkisi sādhakayak taman venuven lækhena viṭa “niyata vaśayenma api eya viśvāsa karamu” yayi ovun allāh kerehi sthīra vū divrumak kara, pavasannāha. (eyaṭa nabiyē! oba ovunṭa) “niyata vaśayenma sādhakayan siyalla allāhgē sannidhānayehima ættēya. (ēvā ohu kæmati ākārayaṭama ikut karannēya. oba kæmati ākārayaṭa nova)” yayi pavasanu mænava! (esēma) ovun veta (ovun kæmati prakāra) niyata vaśayenma eya pæmiṇena viṭa, eya ovun viśvāsa karannēma næta yanna (viśvāsavantayini!) oba dannehuda
